import React, { Component } from 'react'; import student from '../assets/student.png'; import teacher from '../assets/professor.png'; import parent from '../assets/family.png'; import schedule from '../assets/calendar.png'; import SideNav from './SideNavMenu'; import './SideNavMenu.css'; import { Button, Row, Col, Card, Container, ListGroup, InputGroup, Dropdown, DropdownButton, FormControl } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Chart from './Chart'; import Calender from './Calender'; import SideNavMenu from './SideNavMenu'; export default class AdminDash extends Component { render() { return (
18 STUDENTS 18 GUARDIANS 18 TEACHERS 18 SCHEDULES
) } }
